mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cases in equity during the time of the late Lord Chancellor Talbot [1730-1737]: with tables of the names of the cases and principal matters
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Forrester, Alexander, -1787
Great Britain. Court of Chancery.
Talbot, Charles Talbot Baron, 1685-1737
Williams, John Griffith, 1760 or 1761-
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by A. Strahan and W. Woodfall for Whieldon and Butterworth
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Paging irregular, following paging of earlier edition inset in the margin of the text.
"The following collection of cases is well known to have been taken from the notes of Mr. Forrester ... and ... originally published ... without the sanction of the author's name."--Pref.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
